quote: God, who am I?
author: Sylvia Plath,  The Unabridged Journals of Sylvia Plath

quote: Only God is awesome.
author: Shane Claiborne

quote: God save us from religion.
author: David Eddings

quote: My God is love and sweetly suffers all.
author: Sri Aurobindo,  Savitri: A Legend and a Symbol

quote: Thank God I am not God! Thank God I am not God!
author: Allen Ginsberg,  Kaddish and Other Poems

quote: God steals my soul.
author: Harley King

quote: God blesses to the degree in which you believe.
author: Pamela R. Jeffers,  Something Old, New, Borrowed & True

quote: Only the hopeless love God.
author: Jennifer Donnelly,  Revolution

quote: What do I love when I love my God?
author: Augustine of Hippo,  Confessions

quote: God is dead and I am his replacement.
author: J.D. Robb,  Conspiracy in Death

quote: God depends on us. It is through us that God is achieved.
author: André Gide

quote: God is a book I can no longer read.
author: Floriano Martins

quote: God is the same everywhere.
author: Leo Tolstoy,  War and Peace

quote: If God is for us, who can be against us?
author: Anonymous,  Holy Bible: King James Version

quote: God loves to help him who strives to help himself.
author: Aeschylus

quote: The Lord is God. God is Holy.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita,  Pearls of Wisdom: Great mind

quote: To me, God is like this happy bus driver.
author: Jerry Stahl,  Permanent Midnight

quote: God's love for his people is so great that it turns God against himself, his love against his justice.
author: Pope Benedict XVI,  God Is Love: Deus Caritas Est

quote: The moment God is figured out with nice neat lines and definitions, we are no longer dealing with God.
author: Rob Bell,  Velvet Elvis: Repainting the Christian Faith

quote: There better not be a God because I'll be in big trouble.
author: Patricia Marx,  Him Her Him Again the End of Him

quote: I think God, in creating man, somewhat overestimated his ability.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: I know I'm not God, are you? Don't be silly.God? God? Everybody's God? Don't be silly.
author: Allen Ginsberg,  Death and Fame: Last Poems, 1993-1997

quote: Everyone knows that God protects drunkards and lovers.
author: Alexandre Dumas,  The Three Musketeers

quote: If God exists, I hope he has a good excuse.
author: Woody Allen

quote: Everything we do for God will be the overflow of intimacy with God.
author: Dan Baumann,  A Beautiful Way: An Invitation to a Jesus-Centered Life

quote: God is A.W.E.S.O.M.E! HE is Always Working Extraordinary Supernatural On-time Miracles Everyday
author: Sommer Ellison

quote: He - and if there is a God, I am convinced he is a he, because no woman could or would ever fuck things up this badly.
author: George Carlin

quote: If you understood him, it would not be God.
author: Augustine of Hippo

quote: That God does not exist, I cannot deny, That my whole being cries out for God I cannot forget.
author: Jean-Paul Sartre

quote: People say we are playing God. My answer is: If we don't play God, who will?
author: James D. Watson

quote: God is love, and he who abides in love abides in God, and God in him.
author: Anonymous,  Holy Bible: King James Version

quote: God is subtle but he is not malicious.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: I swear to God . . .”“God doesn’t come to this part of the house, so swear to me.” -Liam C
author: J.J. McAvoy

quote: I cannot believe in a God who wants to be praised all the time.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: You are the God. You are the embodiment of God. The moment you start to love everyone and everything, you are doing your divine duty.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: God has no religion.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: When God is going to do something wonderful, He or She always starts with a hardship; when God is going to do something amazing, He or She starts with an impossibility.
author: Anne Lamott,  Plan B: Further Thoughts on Faith

quote: Love God and He will enable you to love others even when they disappoint you.
author: Francine Rivers,  And the Shofar Blew

quote: God tests, but he does not tempt.
author: Criss Jami,  Killosophy

quote: I am God, la de dah.
author: Anne Sexton,  The Complete Poems

quote: I don't try to imagine a personal God; it suffices to stand in awe at the structure of the world, insofar as it allows our inadequate senses to appreciate it.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: I'm a godmother, that's a great thing to be, a godmother. She calls me god for short, that's cute, I taught her that.
author: Ellen DeGeneres

quote: The only difference between you and God is that you have forgotten you are divine.
author: Dan Brown,  The Lost Symbol

quote: I’m an atheist and I thank God for it.
author: George Bernard Shaw

quote: No matter what the cause, God is only as willing as you are.
author: Steve Maraboli,  Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience

quote: God is a God of purpose. He doesn't wake-up and start dabbling into things; He doesn't practice trial and error. His ways are sure, they may be low but they are always sure.
author: Jaachynma N.E. Agu,  The Prince and the Pauper

quote: The God I believe in believes in me and won’t silence my heart or others based on a paycheck at the end of the day.
author: Shannon L. Alder

quote: God never promised us a trouble-free life.
author: Joyce Meyer

quote: Money is the most powerful and popular god because everybody is praying for money.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Don't believe in God. Love the world just the way it is.
author: Melina Marchetta,  On the Jellicoe Road
